      • learning_clustered

        public static java.util.List<elvira.Bnet> learning_clustered(net.hudup.core.data.Dataset dataset,
                                                             int maxParents,
                                                             int bnetNodeNumber,
                                                             double dimReduceRatio,
                                                             net.hudup.core.alg.Alg completeMethod)
        Clustered learning Bayesian network from dataset.
        Parameters:
        dataset - specified dataset.
        maxParents - specified maximum parents of a node.
        bnetNodeNumber - number of Bayesian network nodes.
        dimReduceRatio - dimension reduction ratio.
        completeMethod - method to complete missing data.
        Returns:
        list of Bayesian networks as result.
